nodes.text: A battle in the Orocco system occurred in 12 ABY, during the Galactic Civil War's Orinda campaign. The Imperial Remnant's 181st Imperial Fighter Group and the New Republic's Rogue Squadron were stalking each other throughout the Mid Rim and clashing in a series of strikes and parries. Orocco was one such engagement, and Turr Phennir's 181st and Tycho Celchu's Rogues battled to a draw.
